DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study : 1 . To provide additional safety effectiveness information commercial use Protégé™ GPS™ Protégé™ RX Carotid Stent Systems SpiderFX™ Embolic Protection Device . 2 . To evaluate rare unanticipated adverse event . 3 . To evaluate physician level experience carotid artery stenting procedure adverse event rate .
DOC.brief_title: Carotid Revascularization With ev3 Arterial Technology Evolution Post Approval Study
DOC.criteria: 18 year Informed consent Intent use PROTÉGÉ™ GPS™ PROTÉGÉ™ RX SpiderFX™ treat carotid artery disease per Instructions Use Meet Instruction Use ( IFU ) / Centers Medicare & Medicaid Services ( CMS ) define anatomical clinical high risk criterion Subjects contraindication outline Instructions Use
